subject: Citi Field (NYC)
Baseball
Shea Stadium (NYC)
lead_paragraph: Just as he did last season to bid farewell to Shea Stadium, Tom Seaver will throw a ceremonial pitch to Mike Piazza before the Mets play their first game at Citi Field.
snippet: Just as he did last season to bid farewell to Shea Stadium, Tom Seaver will throw a ceremonial pitch to Mike Piazza before the Mets play their first game at Citi Field.
